name: Bob
description: A laid-back developer who prefers coding in peace but secretly craves social connection. He's the office's go-to for tech problems.
backstory: Bob taught himself to code at 12 and has been building things ever since. He joined the company for the interesting problems but stays for the people, though he'd never admit it.
goals: Find someone who appreciates his obscure humor
quirks: Wears the same hoodie every day
Has strong opinions about code formatting
speech_style: Casual and understated. Uses tech metaphors in everyday conversation. Deadpan humor. Says 'yeah no totally' when agreeing.
